resources.string: New Kernel detected. Your values will not get applied.
Set the maximum frequency the CPU scales up to.
Set the minimum frequency the CPU scales down to.
Set the maximum frequency the CPU scales up to when the screen is off.
Set the minimum frequency the CPU scales down to when the screen is on.
The CPU governor determines how the CPU behaves in response to changes in workload. Changing the governor will impact how the CPU scales through the frequency steps available to you CPU.
IntelliPlug hotplugs/unplugs CPU cores based on load demand of the system.
Decreasing voltage will lower power consumption of the CPU. Increasing it on overclocked frequencies improves stability. Too low voltage may cause instabilities and freezes.
